5.8. changed Filter

Interface

The general syntax is:

  !block changed
  ...
  !endblock

See Understanding Filter Interfaces, if necessary.

Description

The changed filter is used to mark a section of text as changed.

Examples

To add change bars to a section of text:

!block changed
This text has been changed.

And so has this.
!endblock

Limitations & Future Directions

At the moment, this filter only works when generating FrameMaker documents.
